articles.description: “That was nuts,” Chicago Cubs manager David Ross said after Friday night’s 3-2 win over the St. Louis Cardinals.
articles.content: ST. LOUIS That was nuts, Chicago Cubs manager David Ross said with a smile as he emerged from Busch Stadiums visiting clubhouse after Friday nights 3-2 victory over the St. Louis Cardinals. The thump… [+7501 chars]

articles.author: Jacob Calvin Meyer
articles.title: Orioles beat Yankees, 1-0, behind Anthony Santander's walk-off homer, Grayson Rodriguez's stellar start - Baltimore Sun
articles.description: Anthony Santander hit a home run in the bottom of the ninth to give the Orioles a rain-delayed 1-0 walk-off win over the Yankees on Friday night following a stellar outing from rookie starter Grayson Rodriguez.
articles.content:
The Orioles welcomed the Yankees to Camden Yards on Friday for their final series of the season under vastly different circumstances than normal.
Baltimore is atop the American League East, while Ne… [+9295 chars]

articles.author: Marc Topkin
articles.title: After wasted opportunities, Rays rally in ninth to beat Astros - Tampa Bay Times
articles.description: Jose Siri, acquired a year ago from Houston, sparks the winning rally with a leadoff double and scores on a sacrifice fly by Yandy Diaz in his return to action.
articles.content:
HOUSTON There were a lot of little victories being acknowledged after the Rays rallied in the ninth inning Friday to defeat the Astros 4-3.
Most notably by Jose Siri, the former Astro who basked in … [+4784 chars]
